description: With the maadix plugin it's possible to create private pads in groups and invite users. It's a User-Management System. It allows User to register (otional), authenticate, to create groups and to create pads in groups.
name: ep_maadix
readme:
This is a user-management system for etherpad-lite

INSTALL
=======

1) npm install ep_maadix
2) You can visit http://youretherpad/admin/plugins. Search for maadix - click on install and the plugin works.
(see also https://github.com/Pita/etherpad-lite/wiki/Creating-a-plugin   [Step 5 Install plugin])
